full_text: People have recently asked me where I get news on outbreaks like #2019nCoV. Besides government sources, I always see what @HelenBranswell & @juliaoftoronto have written. They’re the best in the business! And both are Canadians 🇨🇦 living abroad. #TeamCanada https://t.co/c0uNsvd2WU
description: Patient Navigation Advisor at Sunnybrook Health Sciences Centre. Focused on #Health, #Science as well as Space.

full_text: I’m not one to believe in conspiracy theories, but I’m pretty sure Tamiflu (for outpatient use) is one of the most successful scams ever pulled. The evidence does speak for itself (more side effects than benefits) but nobody can hear it because Roche pays the CDC to speak louder. https://t.co/eZWi0TPUA1
description: Doctor. Science Communicator. Nerd. Soccer player/fan. Cyclist. CBC Western Canada weekly syndicated Health & Medicine Columnist. Host of DDx podcast. He/Him

full_text:
The CDC is now expanding airport screenings for that mystery virus outbreak that started in China. This comes after the first confirmed case in the U.S.

Overnight, Chinese officials said they’re seeing more cases there, @miguelnbc reports. https://t.co/0s4Tqnjdq6

full_text: Incredible: For a tiny fraction of the cost of this drop in the @DowJones due to the emerging coronavirus, the cost of the R&D for our nCoV #vaccine could have been paid for 1,000X over. Our biotech industry is broken, too transactional, little vision. https://t.co/tjWKke1ve2
description: Health and general reporter Ottawa Citizen. DMs are open.
